name: Zombie Run Halloween Party
description:
Halloween is near, so let's join the zombie army to comquer the human world.
Grow the zombies horde and lead them through London, New york, Tokyo, Cairo to find tasty brains.
Summon the legendary zombies to dominate the world. From the ancient dinosaur, the vampire king, the ice monster, the invicible el taco, the alien, the dead box to even the unstoppable megalodon are willing to aid you to bring the zombies apocalypse.
Download Zombie Run : Halloween party for free now and enjoy your days of the dead!
Push your skills to the limit as leading the zombies through polices, helicopters, and deadly bombs all along the ways.
Upgrade legendary zombies skills to maximun to help them reach their full potential.
Customize zombies' look with equipment from the shop.
Zombie Run : Halloween party is free to play but you can buy zombie gold with real money to strengthen your horde much faster
Zombie Run : Halloween party outstanding features:
# Simple onetouch control
# 8 powerful characters to lead your horde on their path of destruction
# In depth skills tree to make your zombies stronger
# Customize your horde with varity of hats from the zombie fashion shop
